directions: Beat cream cheese in a large bowl using an electric hand mixer until light and airy. Mix Cheddar cheese, horseradish, and mustard into cream cheese until fully incorporated. Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded extra-sharp white Cheddar cheese
1 teaspoon grated horseradish, or more to taste
title: White Cheddar and Horseradish Spread
